Title: Adrienne Womens Watch White Mother of Pearl Crystal Rhinestones 3 Band Set
Description: Adrienne White Mother of Pearl Crystal Rhinestone Quartz Women's Watch Gold Tone 3 Band Set This very nice watch was purchased at an estate sale. It is an Adrienne brand watch. It has a gold tone band with white plastic rectangles. Also included are two other bands - one gold tone and one gold tone and black plastic. There are three extra fastening clasps included. The case is gold tone metal with two rows of sparkling clear crystal rhinestones. All of the rhinestones are intact. The face is mother of pearl with gold numbers. It has a stainless steel back with Japan movement. The back still has the plastic protective cover and the original battery blue plastic stopper. A new battery has been installed and the watch is running well and is accurate. The watch measures approximately 7" in length. The band measures approximately .78" wide and .18" thick. The case measures approximately 2.09" long x 1.70" wide and .39" thick. The watch is in very good condition and may have never been worn.
